name: NU_AnaplasmosisTestsForAnaplasmaSpeciesIgMIgGAntibodyQuantitative
title: NU_Anaplasmosis (Tests for Anaplasma species IgM IgG Antibody [Quantitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Anaplasma species IgM or IgG Antibody .),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Anaplasma IgG or IgM Antibody;

LOINC search: LOINC search: ‘anaplasma (IgM OR IgG) Ab Scale:Qn  -panel’),(Exclusion Criteria: Panel tests; non-quantitative tests)
